name: Mr. Worry
abilities: Capture a player for the night and talk to them anonymously.
Twice per game, you may deal a Strong attack to your jailed candidate.
You may not capture the same player twice.

name: Mr. Impossible
abilities: Once per game, you may choose someone to revive. They will survive for the following day and night, at which point they will die.

name: Mr. Good
abilities: At any time, you may reveal yourself to the town as Mr Good.
Your vote will henceforth count for 3.
You may not join any night chats once you are revealed as Mr Good.

name: Mr. Forgetful
abilities: Visit a player to add them to your memory.
Anyone who visits you is automatically added to your memory.
One time during the game, you may spend a night to learn all the roles in your bank (but not the corresponding players).

name: Mr. Fussy
abilities: Visit three players. If they are all different alignments, you learn each of their roles, otherwise you learn nothing.

name: Mr. Lazy
abilities: Thrice, you may learn the role names OR identities (your choice) of everyone who visits you.

name: Mr. Wrong
abilities: Check a player's alignment.
The alignment you learn will be wrong.

name:
Little Miss
Curious
abilities: Visit a player. You learn the names of anyone visiting them for the first time.

name:
Little Miss
Late
abilities: Choose any dead player. You learn their night results from the phase they died.

name: Mr. Bounce
abilities: Visit a player. Visit whomever they visit, recursively. Learn the alignments of the player(s) at the end of the line.

name:
Little Miss
Shy
abilities: You learn the names of any other player visited by the Mafia.
You do not learn double visits.
You cannot speak in night chats (though you may be added to them).

name:
Little Miss
Princess
abilities: Choose any set of players. You learn the number of boys and girls within the set.

name:
Little Miss
Contrary
abilities: Visit two players. You learn whether they are the same alignment.
You may not visit the same person twice.

name:
Little Miss
Wise
abilities: Visit a player to learn the archetype of their role (but not their alignment).

name: Mr. Clever
abilities: Visit a player to investigate them, narrowing down their role to five possibilities.

name: Mr. Brave
abilities: Visit a player to protect them.
If they are attacked, you will take the attack on their behalf, and deal an attack to their attacker.

name: Mr. Bump
abilities: Visit a player to protect them from attacks.
One time, protect yourself from attacks.

name: Mr. Jelly
abilities: Coat someone in protective jelly, saving them from the next standard attack they incur.
Jelly lasts indefinitely until attacked, but you may only have jelly on two people at a time.
During the day, remove jelly from a player.

name:
Little Miss
Sunshine
abilities: Shine light on a player, shielding them from evil energy. Any actions by non-town players (aside from attacks) will be unable to affect them.

name: Mr. Grumpy
abilities: Once during the game, you may protect yourself and deal a standard attack to everyone who visits you. This action cannot be roleblocked.
For each player you attack, you gain a charge of the above ability.

name:
Little Miss
Scary
abilities: Visit a player to scare them, dealing a standard attack.
You may shoot as many times as you like, but if you shoot a town member you will die.

name: Mr. Topsy Turvy
abilities: Each night, you may visit a player and guess their rolename. If you are correct, you will turn them upside-down, dealing them a standard attack. If they die, their role will not be revealed.

name:
Little Miss
Tiny
abilities: Twice during the game, you may shrink down inside a player during the day. They will feel someone inside them and know they are marked for death.
At the end of the night, they are dealt a Strong attack.

name:
Little Miss
Fickle
abilities: You may use an alignment check, a standard protection, a standard attack, and create a chat with four total players for the night.
You may only use each ability once.

name:
Little Miss
Hug
abilities: Visit a player to give them a hug, protecting them from attacks.
They are unable to use any actions.

name:
Little Miss
Helpful
abilities: Thrice, visit a player to help them during the day. That night, they may use a limited ability without charge, or an unlimited ability twice.
You may not help the same player twice.

name:
Little Miss
Magic
abilities: You may converse freely and openly with the dead during each night phase.

name: Mr. Calm
abilities: Twice during the game, you may choose to become untargetable. All actions on you will fail.
You learn what would have happened to you on that phase.

name: Mr. Cool
abilities: If you do not cast a vote when you can do so, your vote power is carried over to the following day. This can be stacked indefinitely.
If you are lynched, any Mafia member who voted for you loses their ability for the night.

name: Mr. Greedy
abilities: Visit a player to force them (and all their visitors) to target you instead.

name:
Little Miss
Giggles
abilities: Visit a player to distract them, preventing them from taking any actions.

name: Mr. Muddle
abilities: Choose two players and mix up their positions.
Choose two players and mix up their targets.
You may only use one action per night and may only target each player once.

name:
Little Miss
Fun
abilities: Send out invites to your party during the day! Everyone who votes for you joins your night chat.

name:
Little Miss
Chatterbox
abilities: During the day, create a private night chat with any number of people.
The total size of all your chats (including you) may not exceed the player count.

name: Mr. Noisy
abilities: Post anything you want in announcements (it is clear it is from a player).

name:
Little Miss
Scatterbrain
abilities: Scatter someone's brains across the carpet, killing them instantly.
The first time you attack someone who would survive your attack, they are instead dealt a Strong attack.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name:
Little Miss
Surprise
abilities: Pop up outside your target's house, lying in wait for a specific role. If that role visits your target, you deal a standard attack, but your name is revealed to any other visitors.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name:
Little Miss
Brainy
abilities: Visit a player and use your big brain to deduce their role.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name: Mr. Nosey
abilities: Each night you learn the names of all players in night chats.
Once per game, you may choose a chat to eavesdrop: you may read through it the next day.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name: Mr. Tall
abilities: Peer over someone's shoulder to watch where they go at night, see which players visit them, and learn their night results.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name: Mr. Dizzy
abilities: Spin up a protective shield around a player of your choice, protecting them from standard attacks.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name:
Little Miss
Bad
abilities: You appear as town when investigated.
You are immune to standard attacks.
On any day, you may permanently become any other Mafia role from the rolelist (losing the above privileges).
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name: Mr. Nonsense
abilities: During the day, create a private night chat with any number of people.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name: Mr. Messy
abilities: Mess up the path to someone's house. All Town members who try to visit them will have their actions scrambled and fail.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name:
Little Miss
Fabulous
abilities: Visit a player and dress them up, choosing the role they appear as to investigative abilities and the player they appear to visit for the duration of the night.
This does not affect death announcements.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name:
Little Miss
Tidy
abilities: Three times per game, you may tidy up a player's belongings during the night. If they die that night, their role will not be revealed.
You learn their role.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name: Mr. Fib
abilities: Visit a player and tell them a lie: overwrite, edit or augment their night results in any way you choose.
Post anything you want in announcements (it is clear it is from a player).
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name: Mr. Tickle
abilities: Once per cycle, tickle a player to prevent them from using an action that phase.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name: Mr. Rude
abilities: Shout over someone, bullying them into keeping quiet for the following day.
You may not target the same person twice.
wincon: Eliminate all opponents of the Mafia.

name:
Little Miss
Neat
abilities: Visit a player to learn their role.
You win by correctly identifying the role of every living player before you die.
You die upon making a guess, whether it is correct or incorrect.

name: Mr. Nobody
abilities: You must survive to the end of the game.
You cannot be targeted or investigated: anyone attempting to do so will have their action fail.
wincon: Survive to the end of the game.

name:
Little Miss
Lucky
abilities: You are assigned a random non-Power town role to guard.
You may protect them twice during the game while you are alive.
wincon: Keep your charge alive at least as long as any other town member.

name: Mr. Funny
abilities: Tell a player a joke each night.
wincon: Tell a joke to every living player.

name:
Little Miss
Bossy
abilities: Choose a player and boss them around, controlling their night action.
They will know they have been controlled.
You also learn their role.

name:
Little Miss
Naughty
abilities: When you are lynched, everyone who voted for you is unable to use any actions the following night.
You may visit a player each phase, and act generally naughty.

name:
Little Miss
Trouble
abilities: During the day, nullify the vote of one other player of your choice. You may also choose to submit a private vote to override your public vote.
During the night, you may visit a player. If they are lynched the following day (and a member of the town) you win the game.
wincon: Choose a Town member and get them lynched.

name: Mr. Sneeze
abilities: You begin the game sick and with resistance to standard attacks; anyone who visits you also becomes sick.
Visit a player nightly to infect them and all their visitors. Learn the list of sick players.
When everyone alive is sick, it is announced that you are unkillable at night and may choose someone to die of sickness nightly.

name: Mr. Strong
abilities: Deal a Strong attack to a player.
You are passively protected from attacks.

name: Mr. Slow
abilities: You may deal a standard attack from Night 2 onwards.
With each kill, you gain defence, then a Strong attack, then a permanent disguise, then roleblock/control/redirect immunity, then a standard attack during the day.

name:
Little Miss
Twins
abilities: You may freely deal a standard attack to a player (without visiting them).
At night, visit another player to disguise yourself as their role. During the day, cast a second vote in private. The first time you would die, you instead lose this ability.
